thread.title: Why Nordstrom’s So-So Results Are Good News for the Nordstroms

author: Elizabeth Winkler
title: Why Nordstrom’s So-So Results Are Good News for the Nordstroms
text:
Nordstrom narrowly missed analysts’ expectations when it reported fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday. For the namesake family, which is considering taking the company private, that may have been the best thing the retailer could have done.
For a retailer that is investing heavily and, it seems, successfully in a fast-changing industry, the risk was that the numbers were good, the shares shot up and the deal became too expensive. The stock is up 11% in the last 12 months and 6.5% since the beginning of 2018. Sales for fiscal... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
